about_the_game:
This game is currently under extremely active development by one person. The screenshots of the game do not reflect the style of the game, the final quality, and the final version of the game will be vastly different from most anything you can see right now. It's created for the most part for fans on my social networks who have long wanted to add my game to their wishlist, and thus follow the game's development. Thank you for your understanding.



Dreadshot is a new-school fast-paced FPS, made by solo-gamedeveloper, that combines a lot of dynamic shooters like Doom Eternal, Titanfall, and is augmented with platforming elements from games like Ghostrunner and Katana Zero.



Delta Inc. is creating its own metaverse game, codename "Project Elisium", which is designed to replace the oppressive reality of humanity with countless virtual worlds, and thus enslave the mind of all mankind for the sake of gaining computing power. You play as an assassin, a professional agent codenamed Dreadshot, and your goal is to prevent the company from releasing the game... Or to help?



- You're given a vast amount of options for movement, ranging from the usual sliding, to grapple-hooking, wall running, and other more complex mechanics that you, as the player, will learn as you progress through the game
- Unlock a variety of unique abilities to divide by 0 kilobytes of tester avatars
- There are 4 types of weapons in your arsenal: light, medium, heavy, and edged weapons, and only one weapon from a category can you use at a time. Combine different weapon options to specifically suit your play style



- Create your own levels and share them with the community in Steam Workshop, creating endless options for digital ultraviolence
- Pass specially prepared levels for maximum speed, set new records and prove that speed is one of the most important characteristics for a mercenary
- Test your stamina in loop testing mode, shredding virtual nerds into pixels

content_descriptors.notes: The plot of the game allows a small amount of violence against virtual avatars of people, realistic models of people (NPC), the presence of a small amount of blood, the use of drugs, the use of alcohol, the raising of sexual topics between characters that are older than 18, the use of weapons.

The screenshots of the game do not reflect the style of the game, the final quality, and the final version of the game will be vastly different from most anything you can see right now. name: Dreadshot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2310 2.9GHz (4 core) or AMD Ryzen 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 7870 or Nvidia GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 x64
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3300U
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final

short_description: Dreadshot is a fast and dynamic first-person shooter with parkour elements. The gameplay wants to combine all the best mechanics of modern shooters into a cohesive whole, аnd the plot is a deep satire on the current state of the gaming industry.
